law.text: If the payment of a license fee was erroneously made or the state director refuses to issue the license the department shall authorize the payment of the refundable amount, if at the expiration of thirty (30) days no appeal has been filed.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 576, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 121, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1998. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2554b-132.
